sentences.chinese: 那件訟案因而尚未解決。

sentences.english: My lawsuit with Microsoft really got me in hot water.
sentences.chinese: 其中，和微軟的訴訟案曾讓我陷入困境。

sentences.english: Costs of the case will be borne by the defendant.
It seems that the suit has to hang over till its next session.
sentences.chinese: 看來這個訴訟案得留到下次開庭時處理了。

sentences.english: Therefore, it became a case about the character of Li Dongyang.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，關於李東陽的人品問題也就成了一樁訟案。

sentences.english: The Ansaris declined to comment on the lawsuit.
sentences.chinese: 安沙利拒絕就這些訟案置評。

sentences.english: Turkish Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan calls the case an attack on democracy.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其總理埃爾多安稱這項訴訟案是對民主的攻擊。

sentences.english: This is an ongoing malpractice suit.
sentences.chinese: 這是一起正在審理的醫療事故訟案。

sentences.english: The man who brought the case is a lawyer and former intelligence officer, T.
sentences.chinese: 引發這個訟案的人是一位律師也是一名前情報官員T。

sentences.english: Eventually, even lawsuits must come to an end.
sentences.chinese: 最終，同樣的訟案必須停下來。

sentences.english: Ultimately the Roy Cohen suit was settled out of court.
sentences.chinese: 羅伊？科恩的訟案，最後是在。

sentences.english: And a recent court case does not inspire much hope for the Bushmen.
sentences.chinese: 近期的一起訴訟案也沒有給布須曼人帶來太大希望。
